Content: The heritage of an polity is usually generated during the pre-setup
but can be influenced during the game. Every polity traces its heritage
either to a pre-setup heritage (including precursor) an event-heritage
(e.g. empire of humankind) or another polity still active. This
heritage might be shared but a polity might split at any point and its
heritage becomes independet from the others, permitting it to drift
